game.name: Frog story
game.shortDescription: 공수 기술을 사용하여 개구리가 영원한 미로에서 벗어날 수 있도록 도와주세요! 어려운 장애물을 극복 퍼즐을 해결하고 자유로가는 길에 적을 싸울.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The story of a frog trapped in an eternal maze, help a frog with knowledge of karate to go through this maze and get free

reviewHighlights.text: Frog Story is a truly outstanding game that I would highly recommend to any gamer. From start to finish, this game is an absolute delight to play, off...
